title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to civil enforcement proceedings as
provided for by section
3-104
of the

Election Law. It is the intent and purpose of these rules to provide a fair and
efficient process of civil enforcement that ensures due process of law in all
administrative adjudicatory proceedings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6218.1

Adopted

New

York State Register November 10, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 45, eff. 11/10/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
